descriptionHtml:
Fluttershy instead of dragon. To install, unpack Data.7z, and copy content to Skyrim folder. 
You can also download it from:
http://www.mediafire.com/?kr5463p3364ia3
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
For those who don\'t want install mod, here\'s gameplay:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q_QMs4jSazk
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I\'ve got this nice model of pony from deviantart - http://kp-shadowsquirrel.deviantart.com/art/Pony-Model-Download-Center-215266264
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
UPDATE
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I uploaded some files, i think that would fix bug with dragon instead of pony when it flying so far from player
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Also you can watch gameplay of this and other mods in \"Skyrim mods weekly\" [youtube]lqs2lTyP2Uo
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Snowraptor created sounds pack for this mod, if you feel like play with it, just download
author: zdzichorowerzysta
